meanings.definition: The process of creating photographic prints using a photosensitive gelatin coating on a glass plate.
meanings.sent1: Heliotyping involves using a special coating on glass to make pictures.
meanings.sent2: Photographers used heliotyping to print their images on glass plates.
meanings.sent3: I tried heliotyping my breakfast, but the toast looked blurry on the glass.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like heliotyping, capturing moments in a delicate layer.
meanings.sent5: The art of heliotyping brings old photographs to life on glass plates.

meanings.definition: The act of reproducing images using the heliotype process.
meanings.sent1: The museum showcased the heliotyping of famous paintings for the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: Artists in the past mastered the technique of heliotyping to replicate artworks.
meanings.sent3: The heliotyping of the Mona Lisa made her smile look extra shiny.
meanings.sent4: His words were like heliotyping, copying the emotions of others effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The heliotyping of nature scenes brought the beauty of the outdoors indoors.
